{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7100LG |revision= |asin=B01GV0WF2S;US;,B01GV0WF2S;DE;,B01GV0WF2S;UK;, |est_release_date=06/14/2016 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router,LTE router, |fcc_id=PY315400325 |ic_id=4054A-15400325 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, micro SIM card slot, |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=4G LTE, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk 4G LTE Modem Router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7100LG}} {{see also|Netgear R7000|List of Netgear Nighthawk Products}} *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/185-netgear-r7100lg-nighthawk-cat-6-lte-gateway/ External images on '''Openitforum'''] : The FCC ID shown is not currently valid. ''Nighthawk AC1900 Cat 6 LTE Gateway'' * 4G LTE: B1 (2100MHz), B3 (1800MHz), B7 (2600MHz), B8 (900MHz), :B20 (800MHz), B38 (2600MHz), B40 (2300MHz) * 3G: B1 (2100MHz), B8 (900MHz)
